I (fj) /i/ujr
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
January 31, 1959
Mr. Maurice F. Seay
Director
Division of Education
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Maurice:
re: Your grant letter, just received
No secretaries available on Saturdays. And a formal acknowledge¬
ment letter will be sent you early next week. But I did want
to get this off, even though as written try hand, to thank you
most sincerely. All conditions will be observed.
I wanted to tell you that I feel a little cheap with our special
request report reaching you just after this wonderful development
-lest we appear greedy. Our effort to meet the date you
suggested for presentation of the special project request, February
1, provides a coincidence in dates about which I!m somewhat shame¬
faced. It seems a bit ironic and I wanted you to know we’re not
insensitive to this.
With deepest appreciation and gratitude.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skarnia
Executive Director
HJS/dp
